review_content: Clear dark golden pour. Aroma of malt, coriander, citrus and grass hints. Taste is a bready malt with a nice crisp sweetness and hints of spices and hoppiness. Refreshing and drinkable.

330ml bottle from store, had this one many times before drinking it on 5/08/2021 BB 25.03.22 Pours a beautiful rich slightly dark clear golden, with good white head and moderate lacing. Malt, grains, slightly citrusy, grassy noble hops, moderate intensity but good aroma. Taste is malty, grainy with good bread, bit sweet, crisp with nice bitter, floral, earthy and citrusy hoppy finish. Lots of flavour and great taste also quite peculiar, if classic czech pils. Light medium body, smooth, soft carbonation. Nice bittersweet dry finish, really tasty and drinkable for 4.4% abv and very fair price. Nothing that I don't enjoy, quite the opposite. Among my favorites!
Klar gyllen farge med hvitt skum. Lukter malt, gress. Maltpreget med en anelse grape og en anelse sødme i avslutningen.
Found out of bottle from a store in Jaworze, Poland.  Pours an appealing clear gold with perfect white foam. Standard aroma. The epitome of standard for the style. Enjoyable on a hot summer day.
Hyvä perus pils.. Paljon humalointia ja vahva maku. Tykkäsin mutta jotain jäin kaipaamaan. Saunajuomaksi meni.

Arrives golden with short-lived head in the glass.
Malty nose. Taste refreshing hoppy, nice bitter with malty back taste.
Medium mouthfeel, moderate carbonation. 
Pleasant aftermath! 
Plenty of taste for 4..4% ABV. Decent price. Great session beer, one assumes!
Great pilsner! Better than similar ones of their kind. Has a proper taste, drinks easy away. Nothing disturbing. Refreshing after taste

La dernière fois que j'avais bu une Pilsner Urquell remontait à plus de 15 ans, à Olomouc, en République Tchèque. Et 15 ans après, pas de surprise, la recette ne s'est pas bonifiée. En verre nous sommes sur un blond doré limpide sans mousse. Du classique pour un pils. Au nez, malt, malt, malt.... Hum... L'attaque commence avec une base maltée finement épicée et légèrement acidulée. Pas de complexité bien entendu. La deuxième bouche est à l'identique mais un peu plus présente en bouche. L'alcool à 4,4 % est passable. L'arrière bouche par contre est insipide. Et si le final présente une amertume un peu plus poussée, celle-ci est relativement astringente et pas des plus sympathiques. Pas mémorable...et je préfère garder d'Olomouc le souvenir d'une troisième place au 10 km des championnats du monde d'athlétisme des entreprises ferroviaires !
Golden pour, yeasty and full flavoured pilsner with a bready flavour and a banana and creamy aroma. Classic and solid stuff.

Poured from 330ml can at 4.4% abv. Aroma: Light bready malt, slightly sweet, bitter saaz hops, citrusy notes. Appearance: Pours rich golden yellow with large rocky white head and moderate to high carbonation. Taste: Sweet, some baked goods flavour, citrusy hops, long bittersweet finish. Mouthfeel: Medium body, soft foamy carbonation - some oiliness, very slightly sticky feeling. Overall: Very nice classic Czech lager, refreshing and moreish and at 4.4% abv it's a great session beer. One of the better examples of a mass market Czech pils, definitely worth a try even if you're not generally big on lagers.
Aroma of malt and yeast. Golden and clear with a bit of amber. Taste is malt, straw, mild hop at finish, kinda skunky. Very crispy carbonation.
Creamy white good mostly lasting head. Yellow colour. Moderate malty and hoppy aroma.

Can tasted

Pours clear golden with a medium foamy white head. 
Grainy malt with some biscuit herbal towards hay has some citrus grapefeuit qith some orange marmelade. 
Light carbonation with medium nicely balanced has a dry finish with light hayish aftertaste.
Golden, white head and lacing. Malt, hay, bisquit. Bitter marmalade. Clean malt driven base, pine and grapefruit lasting aftertaste

In Pilsner  glass, a super head white compact bubbles forming foam. Soft citrus - think oranges or grapefruit bouquet. Pale yellow to gold translucent in glass with a non aggressive carbonation.

Taste on the tongue hop notes begin to catch up not overplayed , but restrained. Light body, not unpleasant or strong after notes. Can see why this is a popular beer. 

ABV low enough so having a 2nd seems rightly doable.
Clear dark golden pour. Aroma of malt, coriander, citrus and grass hints. Taste is a bready malt with a nice crisp sweetness and hints of spices and hoppiness. Refreshing and drinkable.

330ml bottle from store, had this one many times before drinking it on 5/08/2021 BB 25.03.22 Pours a beautiful rich slightly dark clear golden, with good white head and moderate lacing. Malt, grains, slightly citrusy, grassy noble hops, moderate intensity…
Klar gyllen farge med hvitt skum. Lukter malt, gress. Maltpreget med en anelse grape og en anelse sødme i avslutningen.
Found out of bottle from a store in Jaworze, Poland.  Pours an appealing clear gold with perfect white foam. Standard aroma. The epitome of standard for the style. Enjoyable on a hot summer day.
Hyvä perus pils.. Paljon humalointia ja vahva maku. Tykkäsin mutta jotain jäin kaipaamaan. Saunajuomaksi meni.
Arrives golden with short-lived head in the glass. Malty nose. Taste refreshing hoppy, nice bitter with malty back taste. Medium mouthfeel, moderate carbonation.…
Great pilsner! Better than similar ones of their kind. Has a proper taste, drinks easy away. Nothing disturbing. Refreshing after taste

La dernière fois que j'avais bu une Pilsner Urquell remontait à plus de 15 ans, à Olomouc, en République Tchèque. Et 15 ans après, pas de surprise, la recette ne s'est pas bonifiée. En verre nous sommes sur un blond doré limpide sans mousse. Du…
Golden pour, yeasty and full flavoured pilsner with a bready flavour and a banana and creamy aroma. Classic and solid stuff.

Poured from 330ml can at 4.4% abv. Aroma: Light bready malt, slightly sweet, bitter saaz hops, citrusy notes. Appearance: Pours rich golden yellow with large rocky white head and moderate to high carbonation. Taste: Sweet, some baked goods flavour,…
Aroma of malt and yeast. Golden and clear with a bit of amber. Taste is malt, straw, mild hop at finish, kinda skunky. Very crispy carbonation.
Creamy white good mostly lasting head. Yellow colour. Moderate malty and hoppy aroma.
Can tasted Pours clear golden with a medium foamy white head.…
Golden, white head and lacing. Malt, hay, bisquit. Bitter marmalade. Clean malt driven base, pine and grapefruit lasting aftertaste
In Pilsner glass, a super head white compact bubbles forming foam. Soft citrus - think oranges or grapefruit bouquet. Pale yellow to gold translucent in glass with a non aggressive carbonation.…

Robe blonde filtrée mais avec un joli col de mousse. Le mètre étalon de la Pilsner,  c'est Crisp, l'attaque en bouche est agréable, céréalière avec des notes de miel, la finale sans être longue se caractérise par une belle amertume qui traine sur le palais. C'est propre.

Can, 500 ml. Pouring clear pale gold with a tall head. Medium to soft carbonation with a crisp mouth feel and a light body. Taste moderately bitter upfront with a mildly sweet malt back. Flavors of medicinal hops, pale malt, very mild citrus and herbal, hints of dish soap.
Very nice Pilson, very clean, bitter and hoppy, excellent aroma and taste! The price ratio is also good!
Piwo złociste, klarowne. W aromacie czysto, aromat słodu pilzneńskiego. W smaku trochę słodowe. Piwo jest wytrawne ale nie puste. Goryczka jest zaznaczona, średnio wysycone, pijalne.

Pours a clear golden yellow with a foamy white head. Sharp, crisp, sweet biscuity aroma. Medium body with some light oily lacing. Crisp, clean, semi sweet grainy flavor. Finishes with a light bitter aftertaste with a peppery bite. Refreshing and enjoyable

A beer I thought I had rated long ago.  Not the case.  I bought a 12 oz bottle of Pilsner Urquell at the local HEB recently, have it opened and pouring into my New Belgium globe glass. It arrives a bright yellow-gold with a slender head of snow white foam that provides some lacing.  I smell grain, biscuit and a bit of lemon.  The taste is crisp and dry with citrus, malt, white bread and hay.  Not a beer that stands out but I think the style determines that.
Crystal clear, bright white head, lacing. Aromas of freshly baked bread, a tiny bit of grass. Bitter and dry, just the right amount of maltiness. It's pilsner.

Can + draft + bottle. Rich golden color, very good white head. Aroma: floral, spicy and herbal hops, pleasant plzen malt. Taste: malty beginning, a bit candy, clear and pure grassy hop bitterness, my favorite!
Old rating from 2008 - 330ml bottle, pours golden with a white head. Aromas & tastes of honey, grain, flora, earth & malt. Moderate body. Moderate bitter finish
Perfektní říz, krásně plná sladová chuť, příjemná a výrazná chmelová hořčinka, která umocňuje i dlouhý závěr. Z balených preferuji sklo 0,33l.
An enjoyable pilsner with a prominent malt base which gives it nice bready notes and a bit of body. Simple but good.

Bottle at Three Tuns, Bristol. Pours clear golden with a white head. Aroma: pale malts, grassy hops, buttery hints.  Taste: light sweet & moderate bitter, slightly buttery with sweet-ish malts, bready notes & grassy hop bitterness on the finish. Light to medium-bodied with ample carbonation.

Pours golden yellow. Fine white head. Aroma of malt, grass and hops.
Taste of hay, grass, bread, some honey sweetness. Smooth bitter finish. 
Moderat carbonated. K

Pite jakiś czas temu. Ocena w celu uzupełnienia profilu. 
https://www.instagram.com/czgr_

The original Pilsner. Clear gold color, with a medium-abundant white head of decent persistance. The aroma is light and characterized by hints of cereals, malt, bread, grass and vague hay and honey. The taste is mainly malty and bready, accompanied by a moderate herbaceous hop bitterness. The body is medium-watery, with a discreet carbonation. Not a particularly complex product but very easy to drink and very good at refreshing the palate.
Clear, golden color and a white head. Crisp & hoppy. "Die Vermessung der Welt"

Colore giallo oro; schiuma chiara, a grana fine, alta e persistente.
Anonima al naso, in bocca si sente il luppolo, e praticamente nient'altro.
Uno stile che proprio non mi entusiasma.

A smell of fresh bread and freshly milled malt translates onto the palate with bread dough and a slight green banana note. Bright, grassy hops punch through as this liquid gold cascades down the gullet leading to a crisp but smooth bitter bite. You can almost taste the beautiful clean water that carries this beer. Every aspect in perfect harmonic ballance. A near perfect beer.

More like a Belgian Golden Ale than some of the English attempts at a Pilsner I've tried. Has that same bready/green banana quality that a Duvel has. Not bad, especially at just over a fiver for 6 cans.

Mítica cerveza checa. De color dorado limpio y brillante, espuma blanca de buena retención.
Aroma muy marcado a cereal, en boca predomina la malta aportando un dulzor característico, con ligeras notas a miel. Final amargo y refrescante.
Cuando la pruebas sabes que es Pilsner Urquell. Cerveza sencilla pero muy rica.
Can 0.5 from the store. Pours light golden color, low to medium foam, medium carbonated. Nice taste with a good finish, slightly bitter. Sve u svemu fino češko pivo.
Storica birra pils ceca, tra le migliori nel suo genere. Malti ben presenti, birra dal finale piacevolmente amaro e ben equilibrata.

It's a really exceptional beer when found in tank form. Personally I don't think the beer at Albert Schenke is quite as impressive as Albert Schloss, perhaps that's the volume of beer they sell.  In this unpasteurised "tank beer" form it's at its best. The entire beer just tastes of hoppy fresh bread, the aroma is home made bread, the hop character lingers but never dominates. A class beer.

La pilsner ceca per eccellenza dal 1842. Il colore è il caratteristico giallo dorato limpido e l’aroma maltato ma arricchito da bouquet floreale, mentre la schiuma è fine e poco persistente. Il gusto è ben equilibrato tra il dolciastro dei malti e l’amaro dei luppoli con un finale morbido, infine il corpo è leggero e molto amabile.

Appearance: Pours clear gold with lingering generous creamy white head, with lacing.
外观：金色，清澈。持久、丰富而细腻的白色泡沫，有挂杯。
5/5

Aroma: Lemon, grapefruit, malt, grass, hay and hops, with hints of walnuts.
气味：柠檬、西柚、麦芽、青草、稻草和酒花，伴随着些许核桃味。
6/10

Taste: Sweet malt balanced with bitter hops. Lingering bitter hoppy finish.
味道：清甜的麦芽和苦酒花味构成了平衡。尾韵悠长，呈现苦酒花味。
6/10

Mouthfeel: Light to medium bodied, moderate carbonated.
口感：酒体较轻，杀口感适中。
4/5

Overall: There was a nutty smell of this nearly stale can. Decent and classic, anyway.
这一罐临期了，可能因此带着点坚果味道。依然是不错的经典酒款。
14/20
Una cerveza ligera con una actividad de carbonatación buena, con unas notas agridulces.
Pours a light straw yellow color, with a bright white head and average lacing.  Slightly sweet palate.  Kind of skunky, but above average palate.

Klarowne, jasno złote z ladna drobno pecherzykowa. W aromacie zero chmielu, piwniczne i estrowe. W smaku kwaskowe z niezla goryczka. Po czasie aromat robi sie nie przyjemny. W smaku jakis sztuczny slod.
Fantastic Beer,high quality.Giving the same enjoy as chill or room temperature.I've been in Germany on holiday and me and my two good frends Bojan and Ines drunk 9Boxes in 8days :)

Wygląd: piana biała, drobne i średnie pęcherzyki, raczej mało obfita, trwałość też pozostawia wiele do życzenia. Piwo złote, klarowne.

Aromat: delikatny słodowy aromat z maślaną nutką, do tego trochę nut chmielowych głównie zioła i kwiaty, aczkolwiek na poziomie raczej niskim.

Smak: słodowe z lekkim diacetylem co w sumie tu pasuje i dopełnia bukiet smakowy, goryczka średnia, ziołowa, lekko chininowa i zalegająca. 

Generalnie jest całkiem ok, ale szału ni ma :)

Jasnozlociste (jeszcze nie słomkowe) z białą, obfitą i trwała pianą. Ładny lacing. Idealnie klarowne. W aromacie slodowo,  lekkie masełko i delikatnie chmielowo (na ziołowo). Ogólnie całkiem przyjemne w smaku. Pełne, słodowe, (w bardzo fajnym wydaniu) że srednioniska goryczką (mogłaby być wyższa). Myślałem, że będzie gorzej, a na prawdę nie ma tragedii

Ładna, obfita, biała piana, dziurawiaca się dość szybko, z koronką. 
Złote, klarowne. 
Miły aromat slodowy, lekki diacetyl przyjemny, czysty. 
W smaku przyjemny, wytrawny, goryczka wysoka, zalegająca. Dobra warka. Do 21.06.21

From the tank at The White Horse, Parsons Green, London. A deep golden coloured pour with a huge white head on top. Hoppy, malty, caramel, almost buttery aroma and taste. Not really my style of beer but it was pretty drinkable and nice to try it from the tank.
Grassy and floral. Refreshing light hops. Malty. Punch of bitterness that lingers after the finish. Clean and crisp! Decent.

Fat på Moldau. 
Bärnstensfärgad med ett vitt fast skum. 
Mjuk och maltig, balanserad med  liten aning smör.
Bonic color daurat translúcid. Aroma herbal i a malta. Gust amarg amb punt cítric. Clàssica.

Gold pour, small white head with a ringed retention. Sweet, clean aroma with malt and grain. Taste is the same with a little yeastiness. Moderately bitter with a fruity citrus in the finish. Much stronger malt content than I was expecting. This is very good.

I love a good lager. First time I’ve had Pilsner Urquell. I didn’t know what to expect? Looking at the ratings on RateBeer & BeerAdvocate, I wasn’t expecting more than an average lager. I was in for quite a surprise! Served from a bottle cold, in a pilsner footed glass, it’s fabulous! I was floored!  Rating Pilsner Urquell 1 to 5, this is world class! The aroma is 4, strong, like a dank lager. The look/appearance is 5, beautiful clear gold, with a healthy head and tiny bubbles constantly fizzing up from the bottom. Taste is 5, classic, full bodied, straight down the middle, no denying it’s a lager! Mouth feel is 5. A full-bodied, nothing light about it, fill your mouth with lager feel. Overall rating is 5. Absolutely enjoyable from start to finish! This 178-year old lager recipe brewed in Plzen Czech is classic, hard-core lager, a Pilsner classic! Enjoy🍻!
Tipica birra ceca, capostipite di tutta le Pilsner. Birra molto beverina, corpo dato dal malto e soprattutto amaro retrogusto del luppolo Saaz senza note fruttate.

Bière d'une couleur dorée, fine mousse en surface, bonne carbonatation.
Odeur légèrement métallique.
Goût houblonné, amertume persistante et légèrement astringente en fin de bouche.
Pour une pils ça reste correct
Tap from tank. Malty aroma and taste, yeasty notes, hay, bready notes, medium bitter. Medium body, malty bitter finish. Good.

Sets the standard and holds its own against modern brethren. Surprisingly fruity, with some sweet apple and lemon notes against grainy malts, layers of grass and flowers, and a lengthy floral bitterness on the finish. Smooth, easy texture makes the bottle disappear very fast. Tasty.
Low/medium carbonation.nicely biting hops.a bit metallic,but not much.I prefer the unfiltered version.very drinkable.
The pilsener. King of pilseners. Pleasant refreshing hoppy aroma, not heavy at all. Flying. Slightly bittery what makes it even more refreshing, but the taste is not watery and empty at all.

Head diminishes quickly. Hoppy aroma, not intense.
Clear golden body. Flavor is perfectly balanced. It has hop, malt.
I am not into this style but must appreciate this original one.
Nice pilsner, freshness, a quite bitter but pleasant finish. As expected a cristal appearance and nice carbonation.
Złote, klarowne, ładna, drobnopęcherzykowa piana, trochę lacingu. W aromacie słodowość, lekka stęchlizna, tosty, skromna chmielowość. W smaku umiarkowana słodycz skontrowana solidną goryczką.
Cervezon, para lo que bebemos en España es una de las mejores  gran cerveza .

The beer looks great. Golden beer with a white head. The beer is grassy with  good bitterness. One thing was weird: When i took my first sips, I had just eaten a piece of salami. I wanted to throw away the beer as it was very herbal and bitter. I was persistent and the beer got better and better. Then  took a piece of salami again and again the beer was marely drinkeable.
On tap at u Hrocha. Golden with a white head. Aroma and taste of bread, some grain, Saaz hops, honey and citrus. Nice bitterness, fresh and easy to drink.
Takie sobie ładnie wygląda jakaś goryczka też jest. W sumie bez większych wad,.
It really is a perfect beer.  Bottled, about 2 months old, according to the date.  Grassy.  Tasty.  Clean and crisp.  Perfect pils.
Nice little pilsener (330 ml) from the Czech Republic with long tradition (1842). Bitter but hey it is a pilsener!

Floral hops aroma, some honey and malts
Grassy, balanced bitter flavour, some grain and cereal notes

Goldene Farbe. Mittelgroße Schaumkrone. Der Schaum ist poorig. Im Antrunk erfrischend. Ausgewogene Kohlensäure. Im Körper entwickeln sich immer stärker werdende Hopfenaromen, die herber werden und salzig sind.
Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji w ramach uzupełnienia profilu.
Clear and golden appearance, bright and bubbly. Clean, crisp taste with gentle hippiness in the background. As close to perfect Pilsner as you can get.

Half litre bottle poured into pint shaker. A: Golden, clear, small thin head which disappeared fairly quickly, didn't leave much lacing. S: Saaz hop dominated in a good way. T: Grassy, slight Parmesan cheese, hints of mushroom, slightly bitter aftertaste, all subtly balanced. M: Low carbonation, medium body. O: Subtle but full of character. I appreciated it more after a trip to the Czech Republic.

Drinking a pint a U Pinkasu. A different beer than out of the bottle in the US for sure! What a beautiful pour with a massive, Everest-like head that is pristine white with slight patterns. Color is golden and crystal clear. Spice and a bit of pepper on the aroma. Flavor is spicy hops and finishes quickly and with slight bittering.

Kolor: Złoty, idealnie klarowny. Piana: Biała, obfita, drobnopęcherzykowa, obrączkuje w mig, ładny lacing. Zapach: Słodowo-ziołowo. Smak: Słodowa baza, nieco ziół, zbożowości i chmielu oraz ziołowa goryczka. Wysycenie średnie, treściwość przeciętna. Ogólnie dobry pils.

Aroma: Light and crisp, pleasant smells of hops and mild citrus
Appearance: Clear and bright golden colour with decent head, not hazy
Taste: As lagers go it's one of the best, very nice sharp bitterness at the start with a rounder sweeter finish
Mouthfeel: Very smooth beer, neither light or heavy
Overall: 4.6/5, it's very hard to fault this beer on anything in particular and despite generally preferring ales I find myself reaching for another bottle more often than not
Amărime caracteristică unui pilsner de calitate , miros de malț cu un pic de hamei , cel mai bun pilsner care poți să-l cumperi la supermarket .
Birra poco corposa, gusto e aroma buono ma dal carattere un po’ blando. Schiuma non persistente. Decisamente facile alla beva con gradazione alcolica commerciale.

Acheté au LCBO de Hawkesbury. Il s’agit d’une belle blonde transparente produisant peu de mousse. Au nez, on perçois des odeurs d’avoine. En bouche c’est boisé avec des saveurs de caramel et une pincé d’amertume en finale juste assez amer. La pilsner original est à mon avis la meilleur pilsner que j’ai jamais goûté.

Bottle. Clear dark golden color, fine white head. Strawy, grassy, cereal nose. Dry, high bitter taste. Floral, grassy aftertaste, with a lingering bitterness. Medium carbonation, full body. 
Good, but not as good as other examples.

Clear golden with a one finger wide head.
Strawy and bready smell with a conifer note. Grainy taste with a light bready roasted/smoked and a conifer component. Full body and medium carbonation.
The original Pils is a great beer, it's not the first time I'm having it. It has always been a pleasure to drink this beer.
Difficile de me faire un avis car dégustée un peu trop tiède. Le temps doux n'est pas propice à laisser les bières en extérieur. J'imagine qu'elle est fort agréable une fois bien fraîche.

Appearance: golden, clear, medium carbonation, no head.
Aroma: very malty, hints of yeast and lemon.
Flavor: bitterish, floral, kind of citrucy.
Aftertaste: bitterish.
Overall Impression: that kind of quality Pilsner, very refreshing, easy drinking, bitterish, quite nice.

11.2oz bottle.  Pours dark gold with a small white head.  Aroma is honey, biscuit, floral, spice, and some cereal.  Taste is honey, biscuit, light spice, some cereal, and some earth.  Noble hops galore.  Moderate bitterness.  Medium body.  Medium carbonation.  Crisp mouthfeel.
Sporo było wypitego piwa swojego czasu. historyczna opinia i ocena z pamięci.

Pite jakiś czas temu, stąd brak szczegółów tylko ocena przeniesiona z notatek...
P.S Zdecydowanie lepszy w puszce, w butelce(zielonej) czasem paskudny

Very weak aroma. Very typical pilsener. Doesnt look really that good, looks like a typical industrial beer. Norhing new taste wise. Generally all across the board a very boring and typical industrial beer.
Zbożowe, z goryczką, lekką żelazistością. Wysycenie odpowiednie. W tej kategorii niezłe.

330ml bottle brewed in Czechia at 4.4%. Small, shortlasting head. Very clear yellow gold with possible green tint. Slightly spicy malt aroma, hints of gingerbread and maybe lager hops. Moderate- carbonation. After having several Pils I tried the so-called original, and boy was I surprised. Hint of lemon in the hops - if even that! Could just be wishful thinking. Definite slight earthiness though, leading into brown-bread crusty malt, then toffee and even hints of toast. Really threw me for a loop, this is the sort of malt I'd expect to find in a Porter. That malt along with slight lagery hops, hint of lemon, possible hint of grass coming up in burps - absolutely wild. Was not expecting this in the slightest. Samplers of 'crafty' Pils variants should go into this one cautiously, as it won't meet expectations. I feel Augustiner's Pils is more like what people think a Pils "ought" to taste like; this only barely hits the familiar (to me) Pilsner notes, and its focus is elsewhere. All that said, this is a mighty fine beer - albeit decidedly surprising. That malt with those hops...the mind boggles.
Varma valinta. Et tuu pettymään. Älä vaa oo liia rohkea tiskillä ja tilaa jotain uutta ja freshia tuut varmasti pettymään

Dit bier stond al lang op mijn lijstje om te drinken, maar dan wel in Tsjechië. Geserveerd in een grote pul met een mooie witte fijne schuimkraag en een heerlijke bittere smaak. Pilsner zoals het bedoeld is.
İçimi budweiserden iyi olan Plzen birası ayrıca pilsenerin atası işte bu bira, hafif içimi ile damağı yormuyor tadı ise tam bir pils

Pils tout a fait recommandable, bien au-dessus de beaucoup de ce qu'on trouve en grande distribution en France : du gôut, de l'amertume, pas de sucre ajouté (ouf ! ça devient dur à trouver........). Rien d'original ou "de caractère", mais sympathique pour un prix tout à fait raisonnable.

A classic! Love it! 

Light and easy to drink. I enjoyed every moment of it, definitely coming back to this after another long hard day at work.

8 Oct 2019

Golden color, stable white head. 
Sweet, flowery, fresh-hoppy, malty aroma, very good balance. 
Medium body, medium carb, good balance between malts and hops. One of the perfect everyday beers of the world in its league.

Kilka lat temu dwa czy trazy trafiłem bardzo niedobrą, śmierdzącą partię, ale teraz jestem pozytywnie zaskoczony. Poza tym padł mit, że Urquell z Biedronki jest gorszy jakościowo niż kupiony w Czechach. Otóż mój dzisiejszy Pilsner był taki jak wtedy gdy piłem go pierwszy raz ponad 15 lat temu. W aromacie tylko leciuteńki skunks, poza tym przyjemna świeżość słodowa przeplatana ziołowością i dosłownie ledwo wyczuwalny diacetyl, który później całkowicie zanika. W smaku goryczka na odpowiednim poziomie, wytrawność i lekkie akcenty ziołowo-zbożowe. Żadnych zbędnych niespodzianek. Wielkie, pozytywne zaskoczenie.

Tap. Pours clear amber with a creamy, high white head. Aroma of classic Czech hops and a noticeable malty notes. Taste is semi-sweet with a low to moderate bitterness. Flavors of malt, slight butter, grassy and herbal Czech hops. Medium to full body, crisp texture, average carbonation.
An absolute classic. Tasted great with a traditional Czech gulaš. ;)

Pleasent hoppy bitterness, light body, dry and refreshing taste.
Not very special but very balanced.
I don't really drink pilsner but I like this one.

Blind test - 25 koncerniaków.
Wygląd: Barwa złota, klarowna z rachityczną białą pianą, która w mgnieniu oka znika całkowicie, brak lacingu. 
Aromat: Mocny diacetyl z nutą słodową, chlebową. 
Smak: Podobnie jak w aromacie, mocne masełko diacetylowe, nuta słodowa, chlebowa i akcent ziołowego chmielu. W ustach półsłodkie, treściwość niska z lekką śliskością od diacetylu, wysycenie średnie. Goryczka bardzo niska, ale jako taka jest, ziołowa. Finisz wytrawny z diacetylem.
Ogólnie największe, niemiłe zaskoczenie testu. Mocny diacetyl z akcentami słodowo-chmielowymi.
Makes me happy. I go back to it again and again. Great with a burger, or a plate of spaghetti. It's not fancy. Smells nice, crisp, drinkable. If you like Pilsner...
I've been drinking this beer for a long time, so I'm just taking this here to keep it written
33 cl bottle at home. Drank on September 10th 2019 as Pilsner Urquell (4,4%).
I have tried many beers, mostly industrial ones and I found Pilsner the best among them. This beer you can buy in every corner shop (in my country) and it has a delightful taste. I recommend it.
Not great not terrible. This beer didnt assume me that much,but if you foreigner in Czech republic, you should definitely try this well known beer.

30.08.2019, butelka
Aromat głównie słodowy, dość czysty, z muśnięciem odchmielowej ziołowości. Smak znowu słodowy, do tego wyraźna nuta nasłonecznienia. Nasycenie średnia. Goryczka zaznaczona, średnio intensywna i krótka.
Good and refreshing Czech pils. Had much more depth in flavor than the other German pils we tried in Berlin. Still can't top the Belgian standard tho.
I don't see the difference from others. Price is higher than quality. Ok beer but as I said nothing special.
Having lived in former Czechoslovakia, had the luck to consume a lot of that beer-pivo. Light beer with  bitter character and refreshing after-taste. taste
Very bland, no kick from the beer what so ever. All in all not recommendable. The froth was in a curdled like form but expected from a basic beer!

Nooooo way. What a whale to have slipped under the radar....

You know exactly what it looks like. Stands up surprisingly well in its pasteurised supermarket guise, all these beers in. Slightly buttered, oddly vinegared shortbread aroma with basil-like herb and honeyed bread stick. The taste is better; buttery in a good way, grass and lemon jelly hints, long Butterkist and corn like vanilla finish. Slightly minty. Somehow still hop fresh. Blimey. It's good.

Clear yellow color, mild durable foam. Carbonated enough. Can has bitter metallic aroma, bottle version has malty aroma. Strong but rather pleasant bitter aftertaste. Sometimes it's a bit watery, but most of the time it 's not. Tapped version was the best: it had a little fruity aroma in addition, and a little bit spicy bitterness.
Ottima birra, regina delle Pils. Ben equilibrata in tutti i suoi aspetti. Leggera, persistente e con una nota amara finale a dargli carattere.
Optisch sattes Gold, in der Nase hopfig, im Trunk ebenso, malzig, recht bekömmlich. Für ein großes Bier echt okay.

Cerveza de color dorado profundo, brillante con espuma densa y persistente. Aroma faltoso a pan con toque medio a lúpulo herbal. El sabor faltoso a pan se equilibra con el amargor  medio y sabor a lúpulo espaciado. Es una típica lager checa con una intensidad de malta y lúpulo muy equilibrada y un final permante sin asperezas que apetece beber.

I tried this beer before some many years but i don't get it. Right now i had tried many other different beers from the same style and i believe i can understand this beer much better.
The aroma its not so strong to come out in your nose but give you one ordinary malty "Pilsner" nose. The beer is very balance and is bitter at and very dry. The mouthfeel is very good and sharp and it's very rare for this style of beer and the finish give you one strong bitterness in your mouth. Really the bitterness is something unique here that you can't find in many beers of the style.
Overall one very good "Pilsener" to had. Perhaps one of the best for the style and the 4.4% become the beer even better. You can drink as many as you want.

Barwa złota, klarowne, przejrzyste, fajnie pracuje. Piana biała, raczej obfita, bardzo szybko się redukuje prawie do zera. Aromat mocno słodowy oraz chmielowy, lekko diacetyl - który moim zdaniem nie jest wadą. W smaku na pierwszym planie przyjemna niezbyt intensywna goryczka oraz przyjemny słodowy smak. Średnio wysycone, alkohol niewyczuwalny, diacetyl oraz świetna pijalność. Finish chmielowy, trochę nawet żywiczny ale bardzo delikatnie. Ogólnie krótki, delikatny i bardzo przyjemny. Moim zdaniem goryczka jest zbyt niska. Poza tym bardzo dobry Pils.
#12, 4/2015 and many times before and after in many pubs and from hundreds of bottles.

16 oz. can from 4 pack- served in a tumbler- poured a transparent orange-yellow color, 2 mm white head formed and tried its best to lace upon the vessel.  Aroma of yeast and hard water- yippee.  Hits the mouth with a medium body, malt is able to be detected but it’s just an odd feel.  Middle holds up well, finish is solid and has a light fruit note to it.  Good- can’t believe I haven’t had it yet.

Family Market 33 lei - 0.5l
O bere pilsner etalon pentru mine.Culoare gust şi aromă aproape ideală

Te poti baza pe calitatea berii blonde Pilsner Urquell, deoarece este prima bere blonda din lume. La o astfel de traditie, nu are cum sa te dezamageasca. Gustul sau este pe placul tau, de aceea nu lipseste niciodata din frigider. Te relaxeaza si iti improspateaza corpul. Daca o consumi in cantitati moderate, poate fi chiar si benefica pentru organismul tau.

The best beer in Pilsner type in the world. World"s masrerpiece. This beer You can drink in big quantities and it has it"s own beautiful taste, the Nr. 1 Pilsner. It's hard to describe, You  just must try it
Great beer in every aspect. Beautiful golden clear colour with medium white head. Taste is good with no aftertaste.

Riktigt äcklig öl
Bäsk smak och en av Tjeckiens absolut sämsta öl rekommenderas Inte
Uzupełnienie ocen piwnych bez opisu z uwagi na przeniesienie z papierowych zapisków.
Aus der Pulle. Vom Geruch her Lager. Der Antrunk ist erfrischend würzig. Leckerer Aromahopfen. Gutes Bier

Bottom fermetated lager, nice balanced taste and acidity, lowest taste 
of aroma hops.
Can in Prague. Clear golden with frothy white head. Aroma is very malty, some light honey, slightly herbal. Relatively dry and bitter.

How the hell have I not rated this yet? Been drinking this heavenly elixir for years now. Crisp, bright, hoppy, clean... what’s not to enjoy from this fine Czech concoction? A bit of history in every bottle. Deliciously peppery.

Aromat lekko chmielowy, ziołowy z wyraźnym masełkiem. W smaku piwo jest na szczęście trochę bardziej wytrawne niż większość koncernowych pilsów. Masełko może trochę denerwować, ale na pewno zwiększa pełność tego piwa.
Robe dorée et mousse blanche fine et abondante. Arôme doux et fruité, sans acidité. Rafraîchissant et agréable en bouche, peut de boire en toute occasion, à table ou non.

A solid pils which scores with its full balanced aroma and a malty slight caramel color, best from the glass/barrel. The hoppy bitterness is present but smooth combined with a light touch of lager maltyness (zb budweis).
pite jakiś czas temu. uzupełnienie profilu. Ocena przepisana z utpd. Miłego dnia.

12.06.2019
Złote. Bardzo klarowne. Piana biała. Szybko znikająca. 
W aromacie słodowo, chmielowo i z masełkiem. 
Smakuje klasycznie. Słodowo. Bez niespodzianek. Z niezłą goryczką.
W porzo pils.
20.10.2020
Bardzo klarowne. Piana na ponad dwa palce. Wzorowa biel i faktura. 
Aromat chmielowy z nutkami słodu i marihuany. 
Czysty słodowy profil zmącony jedynie chmielem. Którego obecność w smaku, jak i finiszującej goryczce. 
Nie jest to najlepszy pils jakiego w życiu piłem, jednak jak na koncern to szacun.

Keg at the Pilsner Urquell bar at Prague Airport.  Clear deep golden, with a huge white head.  Aroma of lager malt, a little bit of Christmas spice (ginger and cinnamon) and mineral notes.  Pretty crisp, with a definite malty sweetness and a kind of lingering astringent bitterness.
One of the best Pilsners ever. Great balance, honey notes, perfect for so many food matchings. Love it. It will love you back.

Cant believe I haven't rated this yet, had a 4 pack with Dave and Tim in a Center City Alley before the Monks lambic event. Bottle. golden with larger head. Notes are crisp and clean with refreshing grass, toast, herbs, and light citrus. Easy going and delicious but the unfiltered is King in my book.
Klarowne, piana średnia, w aromacie słód, diacetyl. Niska goryczka nieco ziołowa, w smaku dalej nuty maślane, ziemiste i słodowe lekki biszkopt.
Ничем не примечательное, обычное, не противное пиво. Очень похоже на оболонь премиум, ценник не ясен.
Orange color, middle foam size. Good beer, aroma and taste fit into the style.

Bottiglia. Colore giallo oro intenso e schiuma abbondante e abbastanza persistente. Carbonatazione medio-bassa. Si sentono bene il luppolo e il malto. Birra ben equilibrata. Una delle migliori Pilsner commerciali,si beve bene
Consigliata

Belle robe dorée. Mousse généreuse mais très volatile. Bière peu carbonaté et bulles très très fines . Nez houblonné et Fleural. Goût de houblon assez fleural et de pain , caramel doux. Très désaltérant mais manque de goût .
Wytrawne, ze znikającą w kilka sekund pianą, lekkim nasyceniem i goryczką. Po ocenach liczyłem na bardzo dobre, otrzymałem przeciętne. Kwestia smaku.

Excellent balanced Czech pilsener!
Beer golden brown, Czech hops, a little caramel.
Taste hoppy, pleasant bitterness, at the end of carried sweetness. Malt aftertaste.
Excellent balanced Czech pilsener!

Barwa złota, piwo krystaliczne, piana biała.
Aromat mało intensywny, słodowy z lekkim ziołowym zacięciem. 
W smaku lekkie, bardzo orzeźwiające, z podkresloną ziołową goryczką.
Tap at Oyster and Otter, Blackburn. Clear golden appearance. Aroma is sweet, malt and corn. Flavour is malt, floral and slightly bitter.
Light, clear, a bit crisp and refreshing: this how a proper lager should taste!
gold. smell bready, straw. taste is grassy and bready. medium bitterness. lovely

Old rating rerated 25.04.2019, 0,5l can @ home:

Big slightly bubbly-creamy mediumlasting head. Aroma is slightly dry grainy, weeds, dried grain, paper, wash cloth, light malts, bark, soil, leafs, flowers. Taste is slightly dry floral, leafs, hay, minerals, bark, weeds, grain, grass, flowers, soil. Medium to longlasting bitterness, slightly dry floral mouthfeel. Fair enough.

Bottle in garden with BBQ, first of the year.  22nd April 19.  Pours golden and clear, nice head.  Aroma is hay and straw, yeast.  Taste is clean, yeast, light bitter, citrus, grainy, pretty tasty.  Also had this on draft in Vienna
Nagyon jó sör,kesernyés,komlós íz,szép hab és szín jellemzi.Életem  legjobb sörei közt a helye,ez nem is kérdés.

Wygląd: złociste, klarowne, drobna pianka

Aromat: trawiasto-ziołowy, lekko slodowy

Smak: średnio-gorzkie, chmielowe, wytrawne, średnio wysycone 

Ocena: łatwe, orzeźwiające, 100% pilsa
Hoppy, enough carnbonation, good bitterness. Amzing pilsner beer with great bitterness
Aroma 5. Appearance 3. Taste 6. Palate 3. Overall 12. Grain and grassy aroma. Malt, herbal, and a hint of caramel taste.

Botella de 33 cl @ Hipercor Zaragoza.
Color dorado, espuma blanca no muy abundante y poca retención.
Aromas a grano y cereal, algo de hierbas. En boca es ligera, amarga en su punto y con notas a cereal y lúpulo. Refrescante y buena aunque demasiado estándar.
Bevuta alla spina.  Ottima bionda.  Una delle migliori della categoria.  Finale amaro leggero.

En copa, cerveza dorada cristalina con una generosa capa de espuma blanca de baja retención. Aroma a cereales blancos, lúpulo, y algo de hierbas y especias. En boca, textura muy ligera y acuosa, de carbonatación media/alta y amargor muy suave. Sabores a cereales blancos y lúpulo, y un fondo muy ligero a hierbas. Una cerveza muy ligera, de baja graduación (4.4%), perfecta para saciar la sed de una tarde calurosa. Aunque muchos la consideren la reina de las Pilsner, reconozco que resulta muy genérica.

W aromacie typowo czeski. Lekko maślano - chmielowy, z aromatem skuna, który mi akurat nie przeszkadza. Klarowny, głęboko złoty z dobrą pianą. W smaku bardzo smukły i miękki, inny od innych lagerów, wyraźnie goryczkowy, ale niestety pusty, prawie jak Staropramen. Kiedyś miał zdecydowanie lepszą, słodową podbudowę. Nieliczny, jeśli nie jedyny koncernowy przedstawiciel pilsa, ale z racji tego, że trudno trafić świeżego, oraz smakową pustkę, do grilla wybieram Żateckiego.

lattina 50 cl, schiuma bianca fine media persistenza, colore oro limpido, al naso lupplo (Saaz) cereali e miele, in bocca è bella moltosa miele cereali, corpo leggero, carbonazione moderata, attacco dolce con amaro moderato. Cosa dire, molto buona, una Pilsner di riferimento. 30.04.19
The original pilsner! Fresh with a taste of bread; nice bitterness. A Pilsner Urquell is never a bad choice.

First of all! enjoy beer where it is brewed. Beer is at top quality directly out of the end-filter at the brewery. Now, of course we cannot all be so privileged as I was back in the day. But! - look at the production-date (not end-date) when you are buying beer at your supermarket. Already one week after brewing, the beer starts to destruct it self…   If you buy a bottled/canned beer, brewed 2-3 weeks ago..  it is long long gone!!!!!
Now then, as to the best beer in the world? - (Remember what I wrote above). To me - Pilsner Urquell brewed in the Czech Republic - is the absolute pinnacle of beer-brewing. For this beer only aroma-hops is used (Saaz) - no pellets..  no extracts..  only pure Saaz-cups.  If you anything about beer - you will know what I am talking about. If I should mention other beers of high standard? : Sapporo Edel-Pils, Jever Frisischherb - Astra Pils (Hamburg) - the latter 2 is long gone (as independent breweries), unfortunately.
For "daily use" I would recommend Heineken (yes) and Carlsberg (yes) since both changed into pure brewing (malt/hops/yeast/water) - and NOTHING else.
Think and drink and think,
Enjoy!

L’originale pilsner. Nonostante la produzione industriale su larga scala conserva una buona qualità.
Si presenta limpida e dorata con una eccezionale schiuma densa. Sicuramente servita da fusto la qualità della schiuma e della bevanda in se sono superiori.
All’olfatto emerge tutto l’aroma caratterizzato dal luppolo Saaz. Tale luppolo domina il gusto con il suo forte amaro pur essendo ben bilanciato dal malto. Corpo e carbonazione medi.
È dissetante e godibile anche se bisogna saperne apprezzare l’amarezza che permane in bocca.
Un pezzo di storia che sa dire ancora la sua tra le lager.

Bottle from Waitrose. The classic Pilsner; - good appearance and classic Pilsner flavours with a good, clean malt taste and gentle, slightly floral hop notes. This is the model that all Pilsners aspired too, butvI find it slightly underpowered these days. Did it used to be made at a higher ABV? Still good, though.

Wygląda pięknie. Barwa jasnego złota z piękna puszysta długo utrzymującą się pianą. Aromat maślanych herbatników. Na początku bardzo przyjemny, jednak z czasem masło wychodzi na pierwszy plan. W tle czuć lekki ziołowy aromat. W ustach niestety brak herbatnika. Piwo dość wodniste. Goryczka wyczuwalna idąca w stronę ziemistości, Dość przyjemna.

The first time it hits your lips you are transported to the fantastic homeland of this glorious lager, the mighty Czech Republic, a land of £2 Pints and filthy prostitutes, what more can a man desire. I can honestly say I haven’t tasted a better Czech since Adriana on the Prague Football Tour 2003. Top pint

Really pleasing from start. Excellent aroma to nose and pours with a nice froth head. Clean taste... lovely body and pleasing finish. I consider it to be one of the best Import pale lagers available. Nothing pretentious about this Pil!

Сразу ощущается аромат классического чешского пива :)
Вкус сперва немного сладкий, но сразу после этого ощущается и остаётся горькое послевкусие, такое, каким обладают чешские пилснеры.
Цвет средней золотистости, пена сошла довольно быстро (возможно из-за несоответствующей степени охложденности, но это не точно).
Пузырики поднимаются со дна на протяжении длительного времени ))
В целом это именно то, чего и ожидаешь при покупкe данного сорта пива. 
Мое скромное мнение - 3.5 из 5, пожалуй.
Backlog z poprzedniego katalogu, ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z marca 2017
Klassiker! Räknas som den första pilsnernas av en anledning. Mums en solig dag!
BBE 29.04.2019. Kuulaan kuparinen väri, olematon vaahto ja hapotus. Maltaisen makea, semikukkaisa suutuntuma, viimeistely semikatkera. Tasapainoisa, hivenen pahvinen mutta täysin juotavaa.

Nice foam and heavy palate. Poors crystal clear along with a fizzy head many different sizes of bubbles nice crown. Medium carbonation. Taste is honey, bread and finishes with a little bitterness. Overall a nice beer that is perfect to a heavy meat dishes and warm summers
El mejor ejemplo del estilo Pilsner De R. Checa. Tan rica como siempre. Bien fresquita es un espectáculo para los sentidos.

Famosa pilsen de la ciudad de Plezen que da nombre al estilo. Ambar claro, poca espuma, carbonatación media. Bastante lupulada. Gusto amargo medio con un sabor agradable. Retrogusto ligeramente amargo refrescante. Cuerpo ligero. Un clásico.

Klarowne, złotawe, ładne w barwie.
Piana ładnie oblepia szkło. Szybko znikająca. 
Smak dobry. Wyczuwalna goryczka. Bardzo przyjemne w piciu.
Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji w ramach uzupełnienia profilu.
Draught. Pale golden coloured with white head. herbal and grassy flavour with floral fruity notes on the bitter finish. Best pilsner on the market.

Tight white fluffy head stayed on a highly effervescent, translucent dark golden body.
Clean floral aroma with some hints of berry.
Medium bodied, soft & cloying over the tongue with a slightly tingly back.
Bitter hops, malt, berry & earthy tastes.
100% beer. The first Pilsner ever. My favorite beer from tap or better from a tank.
Clear golden color with a white creamy, bit lacing head. Has a strong bitter-hoppy aroma and flavor, malty and a bit soapy, bready finish.

Smell - weak, maybe some hops.
Foam - quite large, white, to creamy side, thin, but watery, large in mouth , halfway soft, some butter notes at upper part of tongue.
Appearance- clear, light, carbonated yellow amber.
Taste - bitter, bitter aftertaste, some acidic feel, citrus a bit.

Not my type, but not awful.
Una de las mejores pilsner que e probado  su aroma su suavidad y textura es sumamente cuidada al detalle que su sabor es inconfundible.
It is a decent beer , but it is slightly overrated , it has a bitter taste that remains in the aftertaste.

Tall, rocky white head.
Admittedly very weak nose, maybe some malt and some vanilla.
Taste more than makes up for it, having the crisp clean drinkability of a standard lager but with just enough nuance and finesse to keep me interested, particularly notes of citrus, cloves, and hay.
This is the beer to serve with a large plate of unidentified meat.
Golden color with a spicy hop aroma.  Taste is crisp with a moderate spicy hop bitter finish.

Probada varias veces, en botella y de barril. Color dorado claro con espuma blanca de baja retención. Aroma fresco  y levemente lupulado, cereales. En boca es fresca, gusto a cereales tostados, cierta astringencia, carbonatación media. Final fresco y levemente amargo que te hace beber mil litros.

Piana obfita, niezbyt trwała, pozostaje korzuszek na powierzchni, ładnie koronkuje. Barwa głębokie złoto. Klarowne.
Aromat dość ubogi, słód, DMS i bardzo delikatne masełko.
W smaku troszkę lepiej, jest słodowe bez wad, czuć szlachetny chmiel.
Goryczka umiarkowana, chwilę zostaje na języku, jest gładka, zachowuje odpowiedni balans.
Ogółem trochę lepsze niż taki zwykły eurolager.
klasyk wsórd pilsów, pyszne piwo z zaostrzoną goryczą, dla każdego miłośnika piwa punkt "must see"

0,5l can. Pours clear straw/golden with white head. Aroma of grass, floral, lemon, malty. Taste is initally malty and slightly sweet, but turns bitter with saaz hops. Grassy, lemon, really bitter. Finishes on saaz hops. The definitive pilsner.
Česká ležáková klasika. Ideální sladovost i hořkost, jemná perlivost, příjemná vůně.

Aroma: cracker, biscuit malt,  grassy and little bit spicy hop aroma
Appearance: amber color with superb clarity and a one-finger slightly off-white head which disappears soon.
Taste: cracker, biscuit malt, grassy and little bit spicy hop, medium-low sweetness, medium-high bitterness.
Palate: medium-light bodied, crispy, solid dryness in finish. medium carbonation. drinkability is excellent.
Overall: It is a classic pilsner which has excellent drinkability and delicate balance of maltiness and hoppiness, nothing surprising or special though.

Wygląd: lekko złocista, przejrzyste całkowicie, piana duża, wysoka, duże oczka (ale specjalnie tak nalałem), oblepia szkło.

Aromat: Słodkie - słodowe, leciutki DMS jak mgiełka.

Smak: Trochę jak międzynarodowy lager z ciut większą goryczką, wysycenie niskie (nalewanie z góry), lekko słodowy.

Ogólnie: Nie ma się co rozpisywać/zachwycać

Color amarillo oscuro, cristalina. Espuma blanca media de retención decente. Aroma medio intenso a cereal y un toque herbal suave, como heno. Sabor a cereal, al principio dulzón, más tarde amargo aunque mínimo. Final seco muy agradable. Textura acuosa. Carbonatación media. Superrefrescante.
Pilsner ben fatta. Emerge il carattere industriale del prodotto ma rimane comunque bevibile e gradevole. Voto personale 7.5/10

About as good as it gets 
Pilsner is very hit and miss but this is the benchmark
Ocena wystawiona na podstawie wspomnień z degustacji w ramach uzupełnienia profilu.

Barwa złota, klarowne, piana drobnopęcherzykowa, biała, na dwa palce, szybko się redukuje.W aromacie słód, chleb, trochę kwiatów. W smaku słodowe z solidną kontrą ziołowo-kwiatowej goryczki Goryczka średnia. Wysycenie powyżej średniego.
barwa złota, idealnie klarowne, piana biała, średnioobfita, średnio-pęcherzykowa, dość szybko opada. pijalne, z dość zaznaczoną goryczką, wersja puszkowa jak najbardziej ok.
Sehr gutes Pils (kommt ja auch von der Urquelle ;) wirklich immer gut, Flaschenkinder

Butelka, barwa złota, wysycenie średnie, obfita piana, która redukując się do opaski, zostawia koronkę na szkle. W aromacie i smaku słodowo, ale całkiem przyjemnie. Aromaty chmielowe w zasadzie niewyczuwalne. Natomiast goryczka została zaznaczona. Lekkie, przyzwoicie pijalne piwo.

Das Pilsner Urquell habe ich schon in allen Varianten getrunken: aus der Dose bei einem Herbstfest draußen, aus der Flasche mit Kumpels im Zugabteil, selbstgezapft im Selbstzapf-Restaurant...
Und ich finde es immer noch wunderbar zu trinken. Der leichte Stich Buttrigkeit ist genau richtig definiert, um es unglaublich süffig zu machen. Dazu ist es nicht so bitter und hat doch eine frische Hopfigkeit.
Auch wenn es sicher inzwischen ein seelenloses Industriebier ist, so bin ich dem bayrischen Erfinder Josef Groll aus Pilsen sehr dankbar für dieses Bier.

Piwo złociste, klarowne.
Piana biała, dość wysoka.
Aromat słodowy, trochę chmielu, diacetylu.
W smaku słodowo, chmielowo z trawiastą goryczką.
Originál Pilsen, jedno z najpitnejších europív medzi ležiakmi. Značková horkastejšia chuť oproti konkurencii.

Yardstick? Yes, of course... though Heinecken (for one) doesn't seem aware of it. ;-) And it's still a really nice beer, if you're a pilsener drinker. But these days, I'm more interested in variations on the original theme.

Una de las mejores Pilsner industriales que puedas probar, si no la mejor. Notas malteadas y de hierba fresca, así como de lúpulos nobles clásicos. Buen amargor suave, perfecto equilibrio y enorme bebestibilidad.

Õlle on selline jook, et iga uus kord kui klaasi või pudeli suule tõstad, siis leiad midagi uut, sõltuvalt tuhandest-miljonist pisiasjast, mis hetke olukorda mõjutavad. Seega piirdun iga õlle juures selle tekstiga.
Was soll man sagen: das Bilderbuch Pils. Leicht grasig süßlich malzige Noten und eine herbe Hopfennote sind gut ausbalanciert. Süffig, trinkbar, Pils.

Mega pozytywne zaskoczenie - rzeskie, ciut goryczki trawiastej, sporo zboza... z wad to wodmiste i bez chmielowych aromatow zupelnie

jakim cudem niemialem tego checkina? kiedys sporo tego pilem...

Robe blond doré, mousse blanche épaisse, nez herbeux typique du houblon, puis un côté céréale. En bouche, c'est le houblon qui domine, attaque amère, mais pas trop sèche. Le malt vient équilibrer en arrière bouche, avec un goût de pain. Longue amertume en bouche. Peut servir de « mètre-étalon » de la Pils.
Perfect Pils, wat ook zeker te verwachten is gezien de historie van dit bier. Vol van smaak waarin de mout goed te proeven is. Goudgeel van kleur en een goede schuimkraag. -backlog de BierApp-
Carbonatación media, al igual que su cuerpo. Es una cerveza suave, con una pizca de amargor en su final muy agradable.
Pivo dobre boje i mirisa, ali nešto ne štima sa okusom, previše nečega, hmelja možda? I gorko za mene, iskreno... svaka čast, ali ima i boljih...

Kolor złocisty, idealnie klarowne, puszysta śnieżnobiała piana. W aromacie słodowo-ziołowe, średnia intensywność. W smaku słodowe muśnięcie, jakaś tam metaliczność się pojawia, odrobina ziół, lekka goryczka na finiszu. Wysycenie średnie, ciało adekwatne do stylu. Szału nie ma, natomiast jest lepsze od przeciętnego eurolagera.
Can, 4.4%. Clear golden, white head. Malt and Saaz aroma. Malty, bready flavour, sweetish with light hoppy bitterness. Slightly dry, crisp yet with a smooth maltyness. Nice.

Capo di tutti capi of beers. Or lagers at least. You have to try it from tap of one of those pubs, where they serve it from large tanks and where they know exactly how to pour it. Bottled, canned or from a keg can't really tell the story

Burk 500 ml från Systembolaget. Guldgul med skum som sedan försvinner helt utan några spår i glaset. Doft av malt, bröd och frukt. Maltig smak med inslag av apelsin och honung. Medelstor beska. En mycket trevlig Tjeckisk pilsner, en av mina favoriter.

From bottle. Pours with modest medium bubble head that dissipated quickly. colour clear straw. Noble hop in aroma, not too promising. Body fine carbonation but a touch oily. Tastes of bready malt and pleasant czech hops with just a hint of bitterness. lingering subtle bitterness in the finish.
Good Bohemian beer.
Bottle. Pours golden with white head. Aroma of pale malts - little sweetness. Thin texture and body.
Bistro zuta prema blago narandzastoj boji. Skoro bez pjene. Arome trave, citrusa, meda, hmelja i kvasca. Srednje gorčine, duzeg gorkog finiša. Vodeno-uljane teksture, jake karbonizacije.
From backlog. On draft at La Casa Argentina Prague. Light Golden with white head. Malts, hops and sweetness. Nice.

Wygląd: złote, klarowne, biała drobnopęcherzykowa piana - pozostaje po niej pierścień, niezły lacing
Aromat: chmiel, ziołowość, troche słodowe, troszkę diacetylu
Smak: średnia pełnia, chmiel, ziołowość, słodowość, goryczka średnio niska, nasycenie średnie
Data na etykiecie: 24.02.19
#puszka

Aroma: initially lightly toasted aroma with hints of cracker and a little bit of yeast.  As it settles there's a little touch of lemongrass from the hops.  

Appearance: golden yellow body with some yeast suspended throughout the beer, it's very clear. The head is white and thick with large bubbles and lingers good head retention.

Flavor: strong toasted malt flavor like a good crunchy dinner roll from the malts.  A good balance of bittering hops, there light but then that provide a nice bittering that quickly dissipates.   The Finish is toasted malts and there's a lingering malt flavor on the back of the tongue, the balance is malts.

Mouthfeel:  a medium body, medium to low carbonation.  No alcohol warmth,  not creamy,  a little bit of astringency due to bittering Hops and the malts.

Overall:  represents a Pilsner it's got a nice toasted malts characteristics and it's not overly hopped, it's a good representation of a Pilsner beer.

Botella de 330ml varias veces.

Color dorado claro, sin turbidez. Medio dedo de cabeza con retención media. 

Aroma a malta, grano, ligeramente dulce. 

Sabor maltoso, amargor moderado, carbonatacion media. 

Una cerveza iconica que no obstante ya ha sido superada por el estilo.

饮用日期：2018.09.07
饮用温度：3℃-7℃

风格：Czech Premium Pale Lager

酒精度：4.4%vol
原麦汁浓度：11.75°P
灌装日期：2018.01.04

Aroma-9/12
Appearance-2/3
Flavor-15/20
Mouthfeel-4/5
Overall Impression-7/10
Total-37/50

香气：浓重的蜂蜜感，真的麦芽味浓郁，稍微带点焦糖风味，较低的双乙酰和DMS，酒花辛香较低。

外观：完美赤金色通亮酒体，色度约6、7，酒头洁白细腻，但厚度较低，挂杯尚可。

风味：入口即是较干的酒体风味主导，中等稍下酒花苦味，少许辛香，木质苦感明显些，背后麦芽柔和，焦糖味配合酒花苦味带出一些面包皮感，有少许DMS风味，余味有一些药草尖苦感返来。

口感：中等稍下酒体，沙口感中上，整体偏干，但酒体柔和。木质苦感有些明显使得酒体显得有些沉重。

总体印象：很明显酒花风味陈了，本来应该的花香辛香基本都没了，苦味也变得尖刻。但酒体还是在那摆着，平衡度也可以体会到一些。

建议饮用温度5-6℃左右

Lo assaggiata in qualsiasi forma e luogo... Da plzen a Praga... Passando per i getränkemarkt della Germania fino ai pub italiani. La migliore pils di larga diffusione sul mercato. Une excellente pils rafraîchissante en ces temps de fortes chaleurs. Un goût incomparable par rapport aux autres pils, c'est normal qu'elle soit conisdérée comme la mère des pils. Les tchèques savent s'y prendre pour brasser la pils. Les arômes de SAAZ et l'amertume du SAAZ vous donnent cette note incomparable. L'amertume est poussée bien loin, avec un IBU de 40 et la bière est peu alcoolisée, un must. Bravo à Urquell pour ce divin nectar.

La meilleure pils goûtée jusqu'ici.
Belle robe blonde translucide.
Au nez, bien parfumée, de bonnes effluves de houblon.
Carbonatation plutôt marquée, agréable chez ce genre de bière.
Bière légère sans être trop aqueuse et bien désaltérante.
Assez amère. Des arômes de houblon et d'orge, tranche radicalement avec les pils industrielles les plus connues absolument insipides en comparaison. Amateur de bières fortes et complexes, elle aura tout de même réussi à devenir une de mes bières favorites.

Enjoyed many times, but well before RB inception. Decided to revisit and note by ordering a shaker full at Bulldog Ale House in Roselle, IL.. Displayed a clear, golden hue, with a presentable layer of soft white froth, and spots & streaks of lacing. The nose was soft, lightly sweet grain, with some grassiness & subtle spice. Medium bodied, with appropriate carbonation that escorted a pleasantly palate alerting, earthy & slightly minerally bitterness that lingered some. Crisp, and very food complementary.

Not much in aroma, some herbs, touch of butter and malts. High carbonation and dry body. Malty taste with iron-ish bit (probably from hops, not tanks). Medium but long lasting herby bitterness. Quite nice beer, not great but definitely better than average Heineken or Carlsberg.

Botella de 330 ml, servida en tarro Pilsner Urquell. Color dorado intenso (oro viejo), brillante, cristalina, con carbonatación vivaz y una cremosa corona de espuma blanca de buena retención. Sus aromas son intensos a pan blanco con acentos florales y a especias. Su sabor, también bastante presencial, es a granos hornadas con un ligero toque de miel e intensas notas a flores y especies que dejan un agradable retrogusto en el paladar. Cuerpo ligero y buena carbonatación.

Tank. Impressively dense white head on a light golden body. Flowery hops, a bit earthy, grains, light honey, cereals. Light sweetness, a hint of subtle mineralic touches, light bitterness. Smooth light body with soft carbonation. Very well balanced and not THE Pilsner by accident. Go back to Austrian industrial lager after this and cry.

the aroma is malty and floral with hints of fresh grain, straw and some herbs... the taste is very clear and refreshening, malty and herbal, with notes of grain, hay and some grasses... bitter and dry aftertaste...

According to the history, the Czechs make beers since a while, but in the 1820s-30s they made ales (so top fetmented beers). After the 30s there was a small riot in Pilsen, because the people got fed up the various quality of the beers, and shattered many barrels. So the city of Pilsen decided to make bavarian-style beer. Joseph Groll bavarian master got invited to Pilsen and the brewery was born in 1839. Around the 1870s almost every brewery produced lagers. So this lager is bottom fermented, and it has a very strong, aromatic lager taste. Anyway, i think there are tiny differences in taste between the original and the export ones. Great beer with nice bitterness.
Wyczuwalna goryczka. aromat spoko, typowo lagerowy. nie czuć alkoholu. jest dobrze.
t I expect exactly that from a classic Pilsner, The Father of all pilsners , really hoppy

Botella 33cl. Esta Pilsner no defrauda en lo absoluto. Equilibrio genial, lupulado y cuerpo medio-ligero. Color dorado y espuma no muy intensa. Sabor a cereal, semitostado, pobre.

33cl bottle at home, bought at Slijterij Groningen, Vismarkt. Appearance: clear golden with medium white head. Aroma: light malts, grains, some grass and hay. Una buona pils, perfettamente aderente allo stile: leggera, fresca, carbonazione non eccessiva e luppolatura come previsto dallo stile.

Barwa ciemnosłomkowa, piana z dużymi pęcherzykami, szybko opada bez lacingu. W smaku lekka goryczka i słodkość w finiszu. Bez specjalnych aromatów, bez wielkich doznań ale piwo jak na popularny lager całkiem niezłe.

Bottle. Pours golden with thin head, which disappears quickly... Tastes light malt, with sharpish bitterness on the back end, all underlined with that noble hop smell.Slightly sweet? Thin mouth feel but not dry.. ok..

A méltán híres Pilsner Urquell. Már jópárszor ittam ezt a sört. Szinte minden formában. Csapolva, dobozosan, palackozva. Leginkább persze csapolva nyújtja a legjobb formáját, de a dobozos verzió is okés, ha úgy jön ki a lépés. Most a 0,5 doboz verziót tesztelem. Illatában erőteljes fűszeres komló dominancia érezhető, ízében is a markáns keserűség. Utóíze száraz és hosszan tartó. Állítólag a szűretlen változata a legizgalmasabb, azt még nem volt lehetőségem megkóstolni. Mindegy, ami késik az múlik is.
Barwa złota, klarowne, brzydka piana natychmiast opada. W aromacie masło, słód, ubogo i niezbyt przyjemnie. W smaku słodkie, słodowe Wysycenie średnie, goryczka średnia, bardzo wodniste. Kiepsko.

Cóż można napisać o Pisnerze Urquell-u? Warto pić z puszki, żeby uniknąć skunksa (takiego tez oceniam), poza tym jest słodowo, z obowiązkową nutą diacetylu, goryczka jak na czeskiego pilsa, dość niska, porównując do koncerniaków, jest za to wyraźnie zaznaczona, zdecydowanie ziołowo-trawiasta, dość ciężka i zalegająca. Większych wad nie ma, choć pamiętam, że trafiałem sztuki z nutami mokrego kartonu. Piwo zdecydowanie wybitne nie jest, ale jako szeroko dostępne i do tego dość pijalne, na pewno jest dobrym wyborem na grilla w upalne dni.

Przyzwoity czeski pilzner. W zapachu chmiel, kwaskowość, minimalnie biszkopt. W smaku chmiel, kwaskowość delikatna słodycz. Oczywiście to piwo jest relatywnie słabe, czy też do bólu przeciętne, jednak kwaskowość i smak chmiel nie są tak stosunkowo nieprzyjemne jak w typowych piwach wielkich koncernów, co jest atutem Pilsner Urquell. Sprawia to, że piwo można jak najbardziej wypić bez większego zastanawiania się, ale i bez większego wzdrygania się ze względu na kiepską jakość piwo. Ogólnie rzecz biorąc po prostu przyzwoite czeski pilsner.

Une Pils c'est quoi au juste ? Une bière blonde, légère et translucide, révolution pour l'époque, conçue et brassée à Pilsner en République Tchèque. Quoi de plus simple pour retrouver les sensations originales que cette Pilsner Urquell, LA référence en la matière. Versée bien dorée, translucide donc, petite mousse blanche très fine, on est en terrain très connu. Nez céréalier léger, candi, maltose, pointe citronnée très très lointaine, un peu d'herbes à la marge (coriandre) et c'est à peu près tout. Une Pils donc. En bouche, carbonatation avantageuse, amertume uniquement probante et astringente en fin de gorgée et pas longtemps, un peu de sucres afin d'arrondir (ou plutôt relever) le tout, alcool feignant, corps léger, texture ronde mais flotteuse, levures inexistantes. Rétro-olfaction maigre, longueur faible hormis l'astringence décidément très présente (surtout non masquée par le reste), final inutile à part celui de désaltérer le consommateur. Meilleure qu'une Heineken ou une Kronembourg (dur de faire pire vous en conviendrez), mais en conclusion... c'est une Pils, ni plus ni moins. Sa qualité principale sera de désaltérer et d'avoir donné le top départ aux blondes de soif. En dehors de la légende, rien de bien excitant sous le soleil... Bouteille 33cl, Boissons du Monde, Saint-Egrève.

4.4% Czech Pilsner - Tank Beer - Plzensky Prazdroj (Pilsen, Czech Republic).

Pours a clear, amber-golden beer, with fine carbonation, and a tight white head. The beauty in this beer is its depth and balance of flavour. Unlike its bottled, pasteurised counterpart, the spiciness dances on the palate, working with the carbonation to tickle the tongue. The malt is also rich and unapologetically bold, delivering a wholesome bread and caramel backbone. The fruitiness of this pilsner is also unique: there are definite hints of apple and banana, which add an entirely new dimension. 

Whilst some despise the taste of diacetyl, I firmly believe it has its place - notes of butterscotch popcorn balance the spicy hops, and provide an excellent accompaniment to the malt.

My only criticism of this beer is the way in which it was served! Poured straight into the glass, with a thin head on top, the beer oxidises, and the head dissipate too fast. As a result, the bitterness becomes over-pronounced, and the beer loses its delicate balance. Rather, a generous glug of wet foam should be poured into the bottom of the glass, then the rest of the beer should be poured underneath it, providing a protective cap. This preserves the balance of the beer, and prevents it coming into contact with the air.

This is surely one of the world's greatest pilsners - the original, and the best.

8/10

ATTENZIONE:La mia valutazione viene fatta in base allo stile della birra.
Pilsner perfetta, poco corpo e forte presenza di luppolo ma niente di eccezionale. La birra ha un colore dorato con schiuma bianca ma non abbondante ma persistente. Il corpo è leggero e rinfrescante. Quello che domina la scena è il sapore del luppolo che è presente SEMPRE, cioè dall'inizio del sorso fino alla fine. Inoltre l'amaro rimane in bocca anche dopo alcuni secondi dopo il sorso. Quello che mi ha impressionato è stato la sua leggerezza. Una pecca, secondo me, è la carbonazione che dovrebbe essere leggermente maggiore. Comunque una birra buona, rinfrescante e soprattutta amara come deve essere una pilsner. Ovviamente, l'amaro non è invadente ma piacevole.

Prezentuję się super szczególnie piana bardzo gęsta, mocna, drobno pęcherzykowa, utrzymuję się bardzo długo zostawiając ładny lacing po każdym łyku. Dość mocno nasycone CO2. Prezentuję się super bez zastrzeżeń. W smaku jest dobrze nie jest wodniste smak słodowy, fajna nie zalegająca długo goryczka. Ja gdy mam ochotę na jasne piwo a jestem np u rodziców w małym miasteczku jest to jedno z niewielu dostępnych w sklepie piw które da się wypić. Nie mam dostępu tutaj do sklepu specjalistycznego ani multi-tapu. To piwo mnie ratuję gdy mam ochotę na coś ze sklepu a akurat nie przywiozę nic ze sobą :) Jest do naprawdę dobry przedstawiciel swojego gatunku :)
Gold with a thin head and a sweet, malty nose. Easy intro with light carbonation and finishing bready and honey-sweet.

Couldn't believe I hadn't rated this as drank dozens of pints in the past. Once downed 3 pints through a funnel in Prague. Anyway, an excuse for a beer.
Appearance - golden with steady carbonation. Thin head.
Nose - sweetcorn and green beans. A light metallic note. 
Taste - more boiled vegetables. Light Saaz spice. Again a touch metallic.
Palate - light bodied with a creamy texture. Dry bitter finish. 
Overall - good Pilsner from the original home.
la migliore pilsner industriale. Amaro, secco, bollicine, malto. Tirata. Antani

Bottle 330 ml at Pergola on the Roof, Wood Lane. Aromas are malts and subtle citrus. Fluffy white head, clear golden body. Taste is sweet malts. Well balanced with slight citrus finish. Good pilsner overall.
The father of Czech beer. Still so good although massivelly produced. But I am from Pilsen so my rating goes from heart.
Goudblond. Fijne witte schuimkraag. Aroma : mout, graan. Zacht van smaak. Relatief laag in koolzuur. Redelijk zoet, zelfs vleugje vanille waarneembaar. Qua pils zeer goed te doen.

Thin and a bit metallic. An aggressive but acceptable bitterness is it's predominate characteristic. Very long lasting aftertaste of the bitterness and metallic note. I enjoyed it and found it refreshing even though it was a bit on the bitter side for me

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Just realised that i haven't rated this classic brew, so I must do it right away... Pours clear golden with a large slightly off-white head. Aroma has sweetish maltiness and a hint of herbal notes too. Taste is rather similar; malty caramel and fruit flavour, combined with moderate crispy hops. Smooth mouthfeel. Average carbonation. Tasty and well-balanced brew.
Różnorodnych palet smakowych tu nie odnajdziemy, ale piwo w swoim słodowym smaku w żaden sposób nie odrzuca jak większość komercyjnych piw. Jest bardzo przyzwoite
Well, the original one, the first i used to drink, the reference to judge the others.
Very good beer good pilsner hoops taste and good beer aroma. My best beer original pilsner.
Dorada, con espuma blanca y textura muy acuosa. Olor a hierbas con especias y sabor a lúpulo. Final algo amargo.
Классический пилзнер из Чехии не смог показать мне что то фантастическое. Легкий солодовый вкус и ничего более.

Typeriktig tsjekkisk øl. En mer klassisk pils er det vanskelig å finne. 
En god øl overall. Noen som ikke liker aromaen til Saazhumlen. Kan skjønne det, men er ikke blant de. Synes dette er bedre enn de fleste norske pils du får kjøpt
170910
Kran w PiwPaw. Barwa złota, piana biała, utrzymujaca się. Słodowe głównie. Goryczka zaznaczona, lekko zalegająca. W smaku kwaśne, pojawiają się po ogrzaniu.

Bbd  05.02.18 bought in Cyprus. Crisp clean Amber colour. Very little on the nose and the head doesn't last very long. Minimal hop flavour with more malt drive which hangs on the back. Classic Pilsner style which is very drinkable in the heat.
Can brought by Joseph from Czech. Great nose of light malt. Great head of foam. Nice light malty taste- this is the great original.

[Puszka, warka do 01.10.2018]
Złocista barwa, dość trwała biała piana ładnie oblepiająca szkło. Aromat słodowy, jest chmiel i lekki diacetyl- generalnie to czym charakteryzuje się czeski pils. W smaku słodowość kontrowana ziołową goryczką (która mogłaby być jednak nieco wyższa). Gdzieś w tle przewijają się owocowe estry. Poprawny czeski pils. Tylko tyle i aż tyle.
A good pilsner speaks for itself – lovely colour and taste. That it! Drink it and enjoy.
definitivamente a melhor pilsner do mundo. de um dourado espetacular, combinado o dulçor com lúpulo saaz.
The first and still one of the best Pils available as to my Gusto. More hoppy than Budweiser, yet not as bitter and monotonous as other common Pilsner.

Pretty standard pils, grassy notes, herbal and spicy hops, bitter aftertaste. Bit of a Heineken/Euro lager off flavor makes it not as good as it could be. This may be the original, but pilsners can be done far better.
Greetings for all Beer Geeks around the World. Backlog from other website. Classic

Bottiglia da 33cl. Colore dorato, schiuma media poco persistente. Media carbonazione. All’olfatto sentori metallici. In bocca dolcezza che poi viene contrastata dal deciso amaro che accompagna il finale discretamente secco.

Perhaps the gold standard of Czech pilsners? With stiff competition from Staropramen, I'd say, even though they are quite different in taste, as far as lagers go. Has a robust quality for such a pale lager, and the head, if poured correctly on draught, will have the mouthwatering consistency of cream. Bottled, here in the UK at least, it is still a massively enjoyable beer.
Piwo pite z kranu. Barwa jasnozłota przejrzysta. Piana dosyć szybko opada nie pozostawiając lacingu. W aromacie i smaku przypomina zwykłego koncernowego lagera.
Prijemna plznicka s krasnou matnou zlatistou farbou a s prijemnou jemnou chutou.

Nice head it’s fizzy but small bubbles that add a decent texture. Dry hops.come through with a touch of softness. Not a huge amount of sweetness coming.from the malts. It’s really rather good. Embarrasses the competition with other simler priced high end marco lagers (bitburger, budvar etc). I would love to try it on tap where the hops should reveal more of its.fruity aroma
Kraftig og meget bitter pilsner. Standard gylden farve. God drikkeøl i de fleste sammenhænge.

Bottle from Asda. Looks clear gold with an off-white head and heaps of bubble streams shooting up the glass. The nose has a dry herb coupled with a light citrusy tone. A sweet malt and dusty grain is also there. The flavours match the nose with a light refreshing balance of sweet and herby. It’s medium light with a sharp moderate light sparkle which equals super refreshing. The mild flavours beautifully balanced with the sharp refreshing body make for a smashing Pilsner.

Aromas a lúpulo suave y agradable
Aspecto cristalino espuma persistente
En boca suave refrescante y balanceada

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Clear, golden colored, medium white head. Aroma is of some malt, bit buttery, light grain, moderate noble Czech hoppy, spicy, herbal, grassy. Taste is medium- sweet malt, some grain, bit buttery, medium noble herbal, spicy hops, medium bitterness, dry finish, crisp. Medium bodied, average carbonation, bit oily. Some bottles and cans are nowhere near this good but I’ll remember it as it should taste... fresh, on tap in Czech Republic. Oh, so nice!
(on tap, Brutal Assault festival, Jaromer)
Jedan od najboljih pilsnera koje sam probao! Izvrsnog punog okusa, fino zahmeljeno i lagano gorko
Pite w Czechach. Dość przyjemny aromat słodowy. W smaku też jest nieźle, goryczka na poziomie nie spotykanym przy innych koncerniakach. Przyjemne.
A good clear beer, good taste and palate, the mother of all beers!. Czech pride.
caramel, cereal, pale, clear, frothy, white foam, light sweetness, light body, thin feel, lively,
Z kega. Świetnie mokra piana, w smaku delikatna słodycz mieszająca się z delikatną goryczką.
Przyjemny zbożowy aromat, złoty kolor z dobrą pianą. W smaku wysoki poziom, goryczkowe.

Puszka. Poza leciutką zkwaśnialą maślaną, ma dosyć czysty profil.
Lest leciutka przyjemna goryczka.
Czuć jakby było o półkę wyżej od reszty marketowych lagerów w puszce.

0.5 l can, best before September 2018. Clear, golden with a medium large, frothy, stable, white head. Slightly sweetish, slightly grassy-spicy aroma of grains, some straw and traces of citrus. Slightly sweet, moderately bitter, quite grassy-spicy and minimally buttery taste of grains, straw, traces of citrus and a touch of vanilla, followed by a short, moderately bitter, quite grassy-spicy finish. Medium body, smooth and slightly effervescent mouthfeel, soft carbonation. Way better when fresher, lots of crispy Lager goodness, still a nice brew.

Old rating: 0.5 l bottle, best before August 2017. Clear, golden yellow with a medium large, dense, almost stable, white head. Sweetish, slightly grassy-spicy aroma of grains, straw and a touch of citrus. Sweetish, slightly grassy-spicy taste of grains, straw and some citrus, followed by a short, moderately bitter, rather grassy-spicy and a little metallic finish. Medium body, slightly creamy mouthfeel, soft carbonation. Disappointing, requires a rerate from a fresher bottle. (5/3/5/4/10/2.7)

Butelka. Złote, klarowne, średnio ładna, biała piana. W aromacie niestety skunks (zielona butelka), mokre zboże, dopiero na koniec ziołowe nuty od chmielu. W smaku słodowe, potem troche chmielu, pozostawia nieprzyjemny, jakby rozpuszczalnikowy posmak. Goryczka niska, ziołowa, wysycenie średnie, piwo wodniste. Da się wypić, ale wyznacznikiem styly bym go nie nazwał.
A melhor e mais pura cerveja. Indescritível. Realmente a meta de qualquer cervejeiro caseiro é reproduzir uma cerveja parecida com esta.

Served on tap. Clear light amber colour. Medium, long-lasting white foam. Malty aroma. The bitterness is slightly overwhelmed by the caramel and malty flavour. Medium-low body and medium carbonation. The 4.4% Abv makes it easy to drink. A perfect summer beer.
.
Balcklog. Ocena przepisana z Untappd, w ramach uzupełnienia profilu na Ratebeer.

From the bottle. Bought a 6-pack while q.b. is away. Good looking beer. Aggressive pour will result in a fine and lasting head. Clean and crisp aroma of light sweet malts and hop flowers, with a full malt body and a strong clean bitterness, malt and hoppy finish. I’m not complaining about this.
As grassy, crisp, dry, and thrusting as can be for a lager. Top pilsner, still. Yeah!
50cl can. Very nice hops aroma, dry flavour. Bitter finish. Excellent pilsner, as it should taste
Z kega. Świetna mokra piana, w smaku delikatna słodycz mieszająca się z delikatną goryczką.

Butelka. W aromacie rzeczywiscie jest chmiel, ale w trzeciej kolejnosci, schowany za skunksem i mokrym, stechlym ziarnem. Goryczka nawet srednia, ale raczej nieprzyjemna. Finisz wytrawny, calosc sprawia wrazenie nie do konca wlasciwie skomponowanej. Ble.

500 ml bottle @home,bb 01/02/2018.
Golden,clear. Malt and grass aroma.
Taste is grassy,hoppy bitterness.
Bottle. Pours nice golden with small white head. This is the classical good pilsner. Can drink it anytime and anywhere.

12Oz, enjoyed cold in stemware. dark golden orange. 2 finger off-white head. Sweet corn, caramel and honey aroma. Spritzy and fuzzy like carb. old malt flavor, old gingerbread cookie, caramel and brown sugar, some burnt wood, chewy finish.
50cl can. clear golden color. medium white head. malts, bread, citrus, caramel. low bitterness. low to medium carbonation.

330 mL bottle. Clear deep golden. Smells of sweet malt, a little cardboard. Note sure about this. Tastes much better, though. Spicy and grassy throughout. Still has a sligtly floral character and a sweet malty flavor, but mostly masked by the hops. Light and drinkable. I was looking for a traditional Czech Pilsner for comparison. This was the best I could come up with.

W zapachu lekki słód, zero chmielu. Piana typowo pilsnerowska, średniopęcherzykowa lecz bogata, oblepia szkło. W smaku słód, chmiel bardzo delikatny, bardziej przypomina premium lagera niż pilsa. Lekka gorycz na podniebieniu.

500 ml bottle. Transparent golden colour liquid with a thin porous head that dissipates in a minute. The beer has a soft carbonation. The aroma firstly has prominent noble hops / grassy notes, but after the head had disappeared I could trace some diacytel and grain in the glass.
The taste is dominating hop medium bitterness that attacks the tongue from the first seconds, later lasts pretty long, unleashing grassy and herbal, dry aftertaste. The malt base is buttery with distinguishable diacytel presence. Oily texture and medium body fit the whole impression of this beer. 
I personally like drier and crispier pilseners.

Color dorado, translúcido, con capa de esuma blanca de dos dedos de grosor (no mucha retención). Carbonatación suave. Textura acuosa. Cereal, pan y lúpulo en nariz y boca, también toques de hierba húmeda. Seca de entrada. Amargor final suave. Postgusto seco decente.

Aromat: s?odowy, lekko zio?owo tytoniowy, generalnie czysty aromat. 
Wyglad: klarowne, jasno zolte, piana szybko sie dziurawi i znika. 
Smak: lekko slodkawe, lekko kwaskowe, goryczka ziolowa, zaznaczona, lekko sciagajaca.
Odczucie w ustach: lekkie, wysycenie wysokie, lekko sciagajace. 
Ogolnie: jak na piwo koncernowe to calkiem ok.

Clear golden with a thin foamy white head. Full German grainy nose with Pilsen grains and damp grassy earthy hops and a slight earthy dryness about the whole aroma. Crisp dry bite on the palate with lovely biscuity golden Pilsen malt and authentic German Lager tones. Nice grassy and slightly black pepperish hop bite that’s not bitter but cuts across the biscuity pale body.
0.5L can. Pours a light golden with a thin head that dissipates immediately. Aroma of malts and grain. Slightly bitter. Bitter finish, slightly skunked.
Aromat delikatnie chmielowy - dosyć czysty. W smaku słodycz i słodowość przełamane delikatną, ziołową goryczką. Nieźle się prezentowało.

Wyczuwalny aromat skunksa charakterystyczny dla piwa z zielonych butelek, poza tym słód oraz lekki chmiel. Wygląd - perfekcyjnie klarowne, złote, nie mam nic do zarzucenia. W smaku słód, chmiel, wyczuwalny diacetyl. Goryczka średnia w kierunku niskiej, cierpka, ziołowa. Wysycenie średnie, goryczka zalega w bardzo małym stopniu, nie jest wodniste - ma jakieś ciało.
